meta.title: Tekno Kreasi - Technology Solutions for Your Business
meta.description: We provide technology solutions to help scale up your business through web development, mobile apps, digital marketing, and talent management.

jumbotron.description: By prioritizing the use of information technology, we are committed to providing beneficial solutions for your business.

about.subtitle: Who We Really Are
about.paragraph1: Being the best among others is an aspiration that everyone always has, including business owners. Businesses that have been built must continue to develop in a better direction.
about.paragraph2: We are committed to accompanying your business development with our services to create the right solutions for your business.

title: Problem
Discussion
cards.desc: Understanding partner's desires, offering solutions, achieving goals.

title: Solution
Ideation
cards.desc: Breaking down objectives, designing innovations for production stage.

title: Execution
Production
cards.desc: Submitting draft designs, revising minor or major elements.

items.title: Tekno Solution
items.desc: Technology is one solution to develop business, reach wider audiences and manage business more efficiently. Development of digital platforms such as software, websites and applications can support business needs.

items.title: Tekno Digital Marketing
items.desc: Digital marketing allows you to build closer relationships with your customers through social media, email marketing, and engaging content. This can increase customer loyalty and help you maintain your market share.

items.title: Tekno Academy
items.desc: It is a training program for potential talents out there, facilitated by experienced mentors in their fields. We believe that everyone has the right to grow and develop, more specifically to have the skills needed in the industry today.

items.title: Tekno Talent
items.desc: A service suitable for those who need talents in fields that you need in your business. We offer skilled talents in their fields and make it easier for you to recruit teams for your business.

footer.address: Jl. Taman Evakuasi Indah No.14, Sunyaragi, Kec. Kesambi, Kota Cirebon, Jawa Barat 45132, Indonesia
